Package ch.zhaw.swen1.iotdisplay.platform

Provides interfaces only for application to be called and for them to access the platform resources.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Display
    Provides for setting pixels on a arbitrary rectangle display.
    EventListener
    Must be implemented by classes to receive events from buttons and timers.
    Executable
    Interface an object must implement to be executed on the platform.
    Platform
    Low level access to the platform, including hardware devices and outside connections.
    RgbPixelRectangle
    Rectangle of pixel where each pixel has a red, green and blue component.
    RgbPixelScreen
    Extends RgbPixelRectangle by providing methods to set the pixel value.
    SocketFactory  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    RgbIntColor
    Simple unmodifiable RGB color, where each component is of type 'int'.

Package ch.zhaw.swen1.iotdisplay.platform Description

Provides interfaces only for application to be called and for them to access the platform resources.
Author:
fer
